Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Ridgeland
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Austin, Division, Ridgeland due to, street blockage near North Ave/Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Austin, Division, Ridgeland due to, street blockage near North Ave/Ridgeland.

Allow extra travel time.
